prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English: "Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten."

source_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.

hypothesis.0:
"Felix is sick of it: Mom is always on the road. But why that is, no one will tell him. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his guess seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to solve the mystery of Mom's work. The two are caught up in their first exciting case as aspiring secret agents."
Felix has had enough of it. His mom is always off somewhere. He can't understand why this is, because no one will give him a straight answer. So for Felix, it's clear: His mother is a secret agent.
When Felix gets a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, it seems to confirm his theory. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to solve the mystery surrounding his mom's work. The two end up right in the middle of their first exciting case as aspiring secret agents.The following are the key terms of this text:

reference_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.
